import{createClient}from'@supabase/supabase-js';// Environment variables would be better in production
const supabaseUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_SUPABASE_URL||'';const supabaseAnonKey=process.env.REACT_APP_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY||'';// Create a single supabase client for interacting with your database
export const supabaseClient=createClient(supabaseUrl,supabaseAnonKey);// This allows us to swap out the database provider without changing the application code
export default supabaseClient;
